promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute legendary bird electric-type pokemon wearing a ancient crown. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or bird. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltalon, a a chibi cute legendary bird electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Cross Fist, Spark Ball-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bird", "electric" or "Voltalon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, bird-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange galaxy background
generatedDescription: Chibi legend Voltalon thrives amidst thunderstorms, daunting foes with its Cross Fist power and Spark Ball-GX. Cuteness belies might.
